commands.name: az network watcher connection-monitor output add
commands.summary: Add an output to a connection monitor.
commands.syntax:
az network watcher connection-monitor output add --connection-monitor
                                                 --location
                                                 --output-type {Workspace}
                                                 [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                 [--output-index]
                                                 [--workspace-id]

commands.name: az network watcher connection-monitor output list
commands.summary: List all output from a connection monitor.
commands.syntax:
az network watcher connection-monitor output list --connection-monitor
                                                  --location

commands.name: az network watcher connection-monitor output remove
commands.summary: Remove all outputs from a connection monitor.
commands.syntax:
az network watcher connection-monitor output remove --connection-monitor
                                                    --location

commands.name: az network watcher connection-monitor output wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
commands.syntax:
az network watcher connection-monitor output wait [--connection-monitor]
                                                  [--created]
                                                  [--custom]
                                                  [--deleted]
                                                  [--exists]
                                                  [--ids]
                                                  [--interval]
                                                  [--subscription]
                                                  [--timeout]
                                                  [--updated]
                                                  [--watcher-name]
                                                  [--watcher-rg]
